welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kings Park, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of nature. Get ready to explore our bustling downtown, stunning parks, and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BDR Airport WiFi' on their devices.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport provides customs and immigration services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
